skills.name: Rust Ownership
skills.pattern: fn take(s: String) {} fn borrow(s: &String) {} fn mut_borrow(s: &mut String) {}

skills.name: Rust Option/Result
skills.pattern: fn find(id: i32) -> Option<User> {} fn parse(s: &str) -> Result<i32, ParseError> {}

skills.name: Rust Pattern Matching
skills.pattern: match result { Ok(v) => v, Err(e) => return Err(e) }

skills.name: Rust Traits
skills.pattern: trait Drawable { fn draw(&self); } impl Drawable for Circle {}

skills.name: Rust Iterators
skills.pattern: v.iter().filter(|x| x > &0).map(|x| x * 2).collect::<Vec<_>>()

skills.name: Rust Async
skills.pattern: #[tokio::main] async fn main() { let res = fetch().await?; }

skills.name: Rust Error Handling
skills.pattern: let data = fs::read(path)?; // propage erreur

skills.name: Rust Smart Pointers
skills.pattern: let shared = Arc::new(Mutex::new(data)); let clone = Arc::clone(&shared);

skills.name: Rust Macros
skills.pattern: macro_rules! vec { ($($x:expr),*) => { { let mut v = Vec::new(); $(v.push($x);)* v } } }

skills.name: Rust Unsafe
skills.pattern: unsafe { *raw_ptr = 42; } // avec precaution!

skills.name: Go Goroutines
skills.pattern: go func() { doWork() }(); // lance goroutine

skills.name: Go Channels
skills.pattern: ch := make(chan int, 10); ch <- 42; val := <-ch

skills.name: Go Select
skills.pattern: select { case v := <-ch1: case ch2 <- x: case <-time.After(1*time.Second): default: }

skills.name: Go Interfaces
skills.pattern: type Reader interface { Read(p []byte) (n int, err error) }

skills.name: Go Error Handling
skills.pattern: if err != nil { return fmt.Errorf("context: %w", err) }

skills.name: Go Context
skills.pattern: ctx, cancel := context.WithTimeout(context.Background(), 5*time.Second); defer cancel()

skills.name: Go Defer
skills.pattern: f, _ := os.Open(path); defer f.Close()

skills.name: Go Sync
skills.pattern: var wg sync.WaitGroup; wg.Add(1); go func() { defer wg.Done() }(); wg.Wait()

skills.name: Go Generics
skills.pattern: func Map[T, U any](s []T, f func(T) U) []U {}

skills.name: Go Testing
skills.pattern: func TestAdd(t *testing.T) { if Add(1,2) != 3 { t.Error("failed") } }

skills.name: WebAssembly Basics
skills.pattern: rustc --target wasm32-unknown-unknown; wasm-pack build

skills.name: WASM JS Interop
skills.pattern: const {instance} = await WebAssembly.instantiateStreaming(fetch('mod.wasm'));

skills.name: WASM Memory
skills.pattern: const memory = new WebAssembly.Memory({initial: 1}); // 64KB pages

skills.name: AssemblyScript
skills.pattern: export function add(a: i32, b: i32): i32 { return a + b; }

skills.name: C++ Smart Pointers
skills.pattern: auto ptr = std::make_unique<MyClass>(); auto shared = std::make_shared<MyClass>();

skills.name: C++ Move Semantics
skills.pattern: std::vector<int> v2 = std::move(v1); // v1 vide apres

skills.name: C++ Templates
skills.pattern: template<typename T> T max(T a, T b) { return a > b ? a : b; }

skills.name: C++ Lambda
skills.pattern: auto f = [&](int x) { return x * factor; };

skills.name: C++ Ranges
skills.pattern: auto result = v | views::filter(pred) | views::transform(fn);

skills.name: C++ Coroutines
skills.pattern: task<int> compute() { co_return co_await fetch(); }
